headline: Diageo’s boss Debra Crew steps down by ‘mutual agreement’ after two years
summary: Ms Crew has stepped down as chief executive with ‘immediate effect’ and by ‘mutual agreement’ with the board, the London-listed company said.

headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From PepsiCo Stock Ahead Of Q2 Earnings
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) will release earnings results for the second quarter, before the opening bell on Thursday, July 17. Analysts expect the soft drink and snack company to report quarterly earnings at $2.03 per share. It reported $2.28 per share in the previous year. PepsiCo is also projected to report quarterly revenue of $22.3 billion. Compare that to $22.5 billion a year earlier, according to data from Benzinga Pro. headline: Netflix, PepsiCo, J&J: Earnings to Come This Week
summary: Earnings season continues Wednesday with Bank of America, Goldman Sachs and others on the way. Big non-financial companies coming up include Johnson & Johnson, followed Thursday by Netflix and PepsiCo.
